origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.analyze_model', 'description': 'This function analyzes a financial model based on the model ID and the type of analysis requested.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'modelID', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The identifier of the financial model to analyze.'}, {'name': 'analysisType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of analysis to perform, e.g., real_world_application, theoretical_assumptions.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis', 'description': 'A detailed analysis of the model based on the requested analysis type.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceAPI.analyze_model, 它的参数输入如下: 'modelID'是'CAPM', 'analysisType'是'real_world_application'.
